school.name: Rigina Coeli Institute for French Languages

profile_positions.description:
GT, a global company, handling projects and manufacturing of graphite equipment for chemical processes industries and steel pickling industry since 2011.
Graphite Technology, a synonym for outstanding solutions using graphite components for the chemical processes industries. You can rely on graphite and the specialists of Graphite Technology – The Graphite Experts Company!

GT has many years of experience of handling projects and engineering of chemical process equipment.
Now established in 4 continents (China, India, Europe, America) we can serve end users and engineering companies.

Since years specialists at GRAPHITE TECHNOLOGY have developed and constructed thousands of graphite components with the highest resistance to corrosion. Our engineering team performs not only process design for heat exchangers, but also stress/mechanical calculations for the equipment which comply with worldwide standards (ASME, GB, AD-M, EN, CODAP).

Website
http://new.graphite-technology.com/Industry

Industrial Machinery Manufacturing

Company size
60-100 employees

8 on LinkedIn  
Includes members with current employer listed as Graphite Technology Ltd, including part-time roles.

Founded
2011

Specialties
Heat Exchangers, Condensors, Fuel cells, Gas Synthesis Unit, Heating, Boiling, Absorption/Desorption, Chlorination, Ejectors, Cooling, Quenching, Sulphuric Acid, Caustic soda, Hydrobromic Acid, Organic Solvents, Organo Chloride compounds, Hydrofluoric Acid, Thionyl Chloride, Shell & Tube Heat Exchangers, MCA, Phosphoric acid evaporators, acid dilution-cooling units, vacuum jet ejectors, and Steel pickling
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
World´s Leading Specialist in Critical Process Equipment

More than 100 years of experience and our reputation as technology and quality leader in complex apparatus engineering have made us the first choice when it comes to critical process equipment.
profile_positions.title: Group Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Innopec is a full-service provider of engineering and procurement services for fabricators of heat exchanger equipment supplied to the refining, chemical and petrochemical industry. 
We have a team of high qualified engineers with extensive knowledge and experience in designing, engineering and fabrication methods to all required industry standards and can offer a competitive package engineering services.

The engineering services of Innopec can be complimentary to your engineering department and allows you to decrease bottlenecks when having high workloads or it enables you to reduce costs of basic and detailed engineering for offers in budgetary stage.
We offer high quality engineering to very competitive prices with short delivery times.

Innopec procurement services allows you to decrease delivery times, reduce production costs and increase margins.
We offer a wide range of products used for the fabrication of heat exchangers and pressure vessels such as fully machined and drilled tubes sheets, baffles, covers and nozzles, header boxes, rolled shells and hemi heads

We can supply components in semi or fully machined to drawing execution that are ready for final fabrication.
Innopec can be used for the supply of simple, but labour-intensive products and/or components that consume long manufacturing time. 
Innopec is further able to supply products such as dished heads, welded or seamless tubes and all products used for the production of air coolers. 
We have long term experience in materials, fabrication and the supply of components to heat exchanger fabricators and only works with high quality manufacturers certified to all international standards. 

Due to long term experience in materials development and apparatus engineering and manufacturing we can advise  on material selection and  lifetime improvements of static equipment. 

It is our mission to supply high quality products with added value for our customers to competitive prices.

www.innopec.com
profile_positions.title: CEO and founder

profile_positions.description:
CO2 reduction is now a global priority. Together with our first customers, we at Qpinch, work hard on saving energy in industrial processes. We transform industrial waste heat into usable process heat at higher temperature. The technology is applicable to all major industries that use industrial heat, including petro-chemical industry, nitrogen, paper, pulp and food. 
Qpinch offers exceptional temperature lifts and unique payback times. 

Feel free to contact us at www.qpinch.com
profile_positions.title: Director New Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Product management, sales of propriatry equipment, business development, operating from offices in Netherlands, China and Russia.

Stamicarbon B.V. (Netherlands, est. 1947) is the world market leader in development and licensing of urea technology, used in more than half (> 250) of all urea plants built world wide. Urea is the most used industrial fertilizer in agriculture.
profile_positions.title: Head of Products & Equipment Sales

profile_positions.description:
J. Christof Apparatebau Beteiligungs GmbH (JCA) comprises four companies that has a proven track record of supplying high Quality products with long term experience in complex plant construction and fabrication of highly specialised apparatus for the international market. 

With ACE Apparatebau construction & engineering GmbH (ACE) in Lieboch, APB Apparatebau Schweißtechnik GmbH (APB) in Kapfenberg, Schoeller-Bleckmann Nitec GmbH (SBN) in Ternitz as well as ACE METALNA d.o.o. in Maribor, Slovenia, the apparatus engineering and fabrication is in a position to offer a broad product portfolio to the international market. The export share is more than 90%.
    
The spectrum of services comprises:
  
ACE: Special apparatus and complete plants for refineries, petrochemicals, plastics industry, paper industry, chemical industry and food industry 

APB: Pressure vessels and special valves for polymer generation, highly concentrated nitric acid storage tanks and high-pressure pipelines 

SBN: High-pressure apparatus for the chemical and petrochemical industry, especially for the fertilizer industry (nitrogen and urea)
    
The service areas comprise:
•Engineering, calculation and construction (3D)
•Apparatus Engineering and fabrication of pressure vessels, columns, reactors, heat exchangers, FCC components
•Repair and maintenance work, re-tubing of heat exchangers etc.
•Installation and assembly worldwide
•Organization of heavy Transport

http://www.christof-group.at/en/division/apparatus-engineering
